00039 boost::shared_ptr<Options>
00040 makeRemoteCommandOpt(string pgName,
00041            string& dietConfig,
00042            string& path){
00043 
00044 
00045   boost::shared_ptr<Options> opt=processOpt(pgName, dietConfig);
00046   
00047   opt->add("path",
00048       "represents the path of the file",
00049       HIDDEN,
00050       path,1);
00051 
00052   opt->setPosition("path",1);
00053 
00054 
00055   return opt;
00056 }

00066 void ParseRemoteCommandOptions (int argc, char* argv[],std::string& dietConfig, std::string& path){
00067 
00068 // build remote command options
00069 
00070 boost::shared_ptr<Options> opt=processOpt(argv[0], dietConfig);
00071   
00072 opt->add("path,p",
00073       "The file following the pattern [host:]file path.",
00074       HIDDEN,
00075       path,1);
00076   opt->setPosition("path",1);
00077 
00078 bool isEmpty;
00079 GenericCli().processListOpt( opt, isEmpty,argc,argv,"path");
00080 
00081 }

00097 struct NoOptions{};

00189 template<FileActionType fileActionType, typename CommandOptionsType=NoOptions>
00190 struct FileActionFunc {
00194   std::string mpath;
00198   CommandOptionsType moptions;
00199 
00204   FileActionFunc(const std::string& path):mpath(path){}
00205 
00211   FileActionFunc(const std::string& path,const CommandOptionsType& options):mpath(path),moptions(options){}
00212 
00218   int operator()(std::string sessionKey) {
00219     
00220      return FileApiCommand<fileActionType,CommandOptionsType>::api(sessionKey,mpath,moptions);
00221     
00222   }
00223 };
